feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 09:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -19.8°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
